name: WritingSounds
0:
”Alexa open Writing Sounds”
”Alexa ask Writing Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: writing sounds
des:
Embrace the soothing ambiance of writing without the need to pick up a pen with Writing Sounds. Designed to bring the comforting sounds of pen on paper right into your space. Ideal for writers, artists, students, and anyone who finds inspiration and relaxation in the scratch and scrawl of writing. Writing Sounds is your go-to source for auditory motivation and focus.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Writing Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
